backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing promo video requests in a map with create, lookup, and list operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all key frontend components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating all sections, theme setup, and request form state.
Renders a grid of six example promotional video cards with images, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Accordion-based FAQ section displaying eight questions and answers about the service.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the website footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and dynamic year/app identifier.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the main hero banner with background image, headline, CTA buttons, and key stats.
frontend/src/components/HowItWorksSectio: Shows a fourâ€‘step process with icons and descriptions explaining how the service works.
frontend/src/components/IndustriesSectio: Lists supported industries using cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
Implements a responsive header with scroll effects, navigation links, CTA button, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Displays pricing plans with features, highlighting the most popular option and linking to the request section.
frontend/src/components/RequestConfirmat: Shows a confirmation card with a reference ID, copy button, next steps, and option to submit another request.
frontend/src/components/RequestPromoVide: Form component that collects promo video request details, validates input, and submits data via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/RequestSection.t: Section wrapper that displays either the promo request form or a confirmation message based on state.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Reusable layout component that renders a styled section with optional ID and custom classes.
Displays a list of service cards describing video production features within a themed section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreatePromoVideoRe: Mutation hook that formats form data and sends a create request to the backend, generating a unique reference ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Query hooks for fetching all promo video requests or a single request using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color variables, typography, and utility classes for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin integration.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, required images, and a list of implemented website features for the VlogunrealPromo marketing site.
